summary: Completed comprehensive testing of SPX Finance app. Backend APIs working perfectly with real Yahoo Finance data. Frontend displays all required features correctly with minor chart sizing warnings.

design_issues.issue: Console warnings about chart width/height being -1, but chart displays correctly

passed_tests: SPX quote endpoint returns correct data structure
SPX history endpoint with all periods (1d, 5d, 1mo, 3mo, 1y, 5y)
Frontend price display with correct formatting
Price change display with correct colors (red for negative)
All stat cards display (Open, Day High, Day Low, Prev Close)
Historical chart renders with real data
success_percentage: Backend: 100% (10/10 tests passed), Frontend: 95% (minor chart warnings only)
